annonsrubrik: Hi you Java developer-ready for a new challenge with tons of opportunities?
annonstext:
Altran ranks as the undisputed global leader in Engineering and R&D services (ER&D). The company offers clients an unmatched value proposition to address their transformation and innovation needs. Altran works alongside its clients, from initial concept through industrialization, to invent the products and services of tomorrow. For over 30 years, the company has provided expertise in aerospace, automotive, defence, energy, finance, life sciences, railway and telecommunications.

We offer you a work environment branded by innovation. You will be working with the cutting edge of IT and technology, surrounded by dedicated and skilled colleagues with high expertise. For us, our core values Ambition & Care influence everything that we do, and we will always put our employees before the customer.

The Altran community is important and in addition to professional development, we offer you a variety of activities. Whether you prefer an after work or lacing up your running shoes, Altran guarantee a good time.

 Your role

We are now looking for skilled Front end-developers within Java and as a developer in our Java-team you use the latest technologies, like AWS, to develop cutting edge solutions and services to our customers. The purpose is to help the customers to stay ahead. In collaboration with your team you will be responsible for the entire lifecycle of a service – from requirements, development, test, deployment, maintenance to continuous improvements and new innovations. You are a solution-oriented team player and you enjoy interactive way of working. You should be fluent in English and any Scandinavian language is an advantage. You will be part of the global Altran network and despite professional development, we also offer many different activities with our base in Brunnsparken in Gothenburg - better location is hard to get! 

Your profile

	Java 8,11
	JavaScript, HTML, CSS
	Application Servers (Websphere and JBoss)
	Build Tooling (Maven)
	PostgreSQL
	Java EE Specifications (JSF, JPA, JAX-RS, JMS, GIM etc.)
	Working Knowledge of BI & Analytics tool is desired
	IBM MQ (meritorious)
	Red Hat OpenShift (meritorious)
	MongoDB (meritorious)
	Docker (meritorious)
	Skilled in JSON, CSS (meritorious)
	Skilled in Polymer/Web Component techniques (meritorious)
	Project in Github opened for evaluation

Tools

	Eclipse
	GIT
	SonarQube or similar code coverage tools (meritorious)

Methodologies 

	Safe/Scrum
	DevOps
	Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery

Benefits

• Caring and ambitious workplace

• Altran Academy - Your competence platform

• Collective agreement

• Advantage of a global company with your mobility program

• Competitive healthcare compensation

• Hundreds of benefits on your benefit portal

Is this you? Perfect, we look forward to meet you.

Application and contact

Selection and interviews are running instantaneously as the start is immediate. Make sure to apply shortly as the role might be assigned before the end of the application time span. If you have any questions regarding the job opening or your application, please contact Talent Acquisition Partner FIRSTNAME LASTNAME,  EMAIL

We offer you a work environment branded by innovation. You will be working with the cutting edge of IT and technology, surrounded by dedicated and skilled colleagues with high expertise. The Altran community is important and in addition to professional development, we offer you a variety of activities. Whether you prefer an after work or lacing up your running shoes, Altran guarantee a good time.

Your role

utbildningsniva.namn: Eftergymnasial utbildning två år eller längre
